original_title: Classic Albums - The Doors - Morrison Hotel
overview: Documentary about the making of The Doorsâ€™ album Morrison Hotel, considered by many to be one of the greatest resurrection albums of all time. Released in 1970, opening with its iconic guitar lick from the breakout hit Roadhouse Blues, the album sold a million copies in less than 3 days.
title: Classic Albums - The Doors - Morrison Hotel
